definition: Lakeside district/Hubin district of Sanmenxia city 三門峽市|三门峡市[San1 men2 xia2 shi4], Henan
Lakeside district/Hubin district of Sanmenxia city 三門峽市|三门峡市[San1 men2 xia2 shi4], Henan

sentences.english: On Hubin Road, I walked alongside West Lake beneath swaying willow trees.
sentences.chinese: 在湖濱路，我沿着西湖穿行在搖曳的垂柳下。

sentences.english: Lakeside subalpine meadow in Qinghai important for the ranch.
sentences.chinese: 湖濱亞高山草甸爲青海重要牧場。

sentences.english: About two thousand people in the procession, moving west from Hubinnan Rd.
sentences.chinese: 隊伍約兩千人從湖濱南路一路向西行進。

sentences.english: Still on Hubinnan Rd, approaching Fushan intersection.
sentences.chinese: 仍在湖濱南路，臨近富山路口。

sentences.english: In the centre, three corporate restaurants are set on lakefront .
sentences.chinese: 中心地區，三座企業餐廳設置在湖濱地帶。

sentences.english: The lakeside beach has the essence of seaside beaches.
sentences.chinese: 湖濱浴場盡顯海濱神韻。

sentences.english: South lake, in a quiet environment, the lake clear clarification, full of fish and shrimp.
sentences.chinese: 湖濱茂林修竹，環境幽靜，湖水清澈澄淨，魚蝦豐盛。

sentences.english: You own a cottage on a nice piece of lakefront property.
sentences.chinese: 你對自己有一個漂亮的平房這塊湖濱財產。

sentences.english: Indiana’s shore is still lined with steel plants and refineries.
sentences.chinese: 印第安納州的湖濱仍然矗立着大量的鋼鐵廠和精煉廠。

sentences.english: We drove to our lodge on the lake for the summer.
sentences.chinese: 我們驅車來到湖濱小屋度夏。

definition: Xinshi District of Ürümqi, Xinjiang/Sinshih District of Tainan, Taiwan
Lucheng district of Wenzhou city 溫州市|温州市[Wen1 zhou1 shi4], Zhejiang
see 林陰大道|林阴大道[lin2 yin1 da4 dao4]
Taitung city in southeast Taiwan, capital of Taitung county
Gongguan or Kungkuan township in Miaoli county 苗栗縣|苗栗县[Miao2 li4 xian4], northwest Taiwan
the main river through Shanghai/name of a district in Shanghai
